feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Use Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with a multi-tenant Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
entry.summary: Learn how to use the Application Gateway Ingress Controller (AGIC) with your Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster to expose microservice-based applications to the internet.

entry.title: Integrate IBM mainframe and midrange message queues with Azure
entry.summary: This example describes a data-first approach to middleware integration that enables IBM message queues (MQs).

entry.title: Container orchestration for microservices
entry.summary: Learn how container orchestration makes it easy to manage complex multi-container microservice deployments, scaling, and cluster health.

entry.title: Geospatial data processing and analytics
entry.summary: Collect, process, and store geospatial data by using managed Azure services. Make the data available through web apps. Visualize, explore, and analyze the data.

entry.title: Gaming using Azure Database for MySQL
entry.summary: Use Azure Database for MySQL for gaming solutions so that databases scale elastically with traffic bursts and deliver low-latency multi-player experiences.

entry.title: Gaming using Cosmos DB
entry.summary: Elastically scale your database to accommodate unpredictable bursts of traffic and deliver low-latency, multi-player experiences on a global scale.

entry.title: Deploy machine learning models to AKS
entry.summary: Deploy machine learning models to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) for high-scale production inference.

entry.title: Suggest content tags with deep learning and NLP
entry.summary: Use Microsoft AI to improve website content tagging accuracy by combining deep learning and natural language processing (NLP) with data on site-specific search terms.

entry.title: Choose a bare-metal Kubernetes at the edge platform option
entry.summary: Find the best available option for your use case when configuring Kubernetes clusters at the edge.

entry.title: Big data analytics with enterprise-grade security using Azure Synapse
entry.summary: Azure Synapse Analytics brings together data integration, enterprise data warehousing, and big data analytics.

entry.title: Choosing an Internet of Things (IoT) solution in Azure
entry.summary: You can use this content to decide if you can use a managed solution based on Azure IoT Central, or if you should consider building a PaaS solution using Azure IoT Hub.

entry.title: Migrate IBM i series applications to Skytap on Azure
entry.summary: This example architecture shows how to use the native IBM i backup and recovery services with Microsoft Azure components.

entry.title: End-to-end governance in Azure
entry.summary: When using CI/CD pipelines to automate deployments, apply RBAC not just on the ARM side, but also earlier in the process as developers check in their code.

entry.title: Migrate AIX workloads to Skytap on Azure
entry.summary: This example illustrates a migration of AIX logical partitions (LPARs) to Skytap on Azure.

entry.title: IBM System i (AS/400) to Azure using Infinite i
entry.summary: Use Infinite i to easily migrate your IBM System i (AS/400) workloads to Azure. You can lower costs, improve performance, improve availability, and modernize.

entry.title: Securing your Microsoft Teams channel bot and web app behind a firewall
entry.summary: Secure the connection to a Microsoft Teams channel bot’s web app using Azure Private Link and Azure Private Endpoint.

entry.title: Modern analytics architecture with Azure Databricks
entry.summary: Create a modern analytics architecture with Azure Databricks, Data Lake Storage, and other Azure services. Unify data, analytics, and AI workloads at any scale.

entry.summary: A hub-spoke reference architecture.

entry.title: Azure Automation State Configuration
entry.summary: Use Azure Automation State Configuration to configure Windows and Linux systems.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure IoT for environment monitoring and supply chain optimization.

entry.title: Choosing a Kubernetes at the edge compute option

entry.title: Protect APIs with Azure Application Gateway and Azure API Management
entry.summary: See how to protect APIs with API Management and Application Gateway.

entry.title: Mainframe access to Azure databases
entry.summary: Give mainframe applications access to Azure data without changing code. Use Microsoft Service for DRDA to run Db2 SQL statements on a SQL Server database.

entry.title: Demand forecasting and price optimization
entry.summary: Predict future customer demand and optimize pricing to maximize profitability using big-data and advanced-analytics services from Microsoft Azure.

entry.summary: Integrate Profisee master data management with Azure Data Factory to deliver high-quality, trusted data for Azure Synapse and all analytic applications.

entry.title: Tune hyperparameters for ML models in Python
entry.summary: Shows recommended practices for tuning hyperparameters (training parameters) of scikit-learn and deep learning machine learning models in Python.

entry.title: Master data management with Azure and CluedIn
entry.summary: Use CluedIn eventual connectivity data integration to blend data from many siloed data sources and prepare it for analytics and business operations.

entry.title: Connect standalone servers by using Azure Network Adapter
entry.summary: Learn how to connect an on-premises standalone server to Microsoft Azure virtual networks by using the Azure Network Adapter that you deploy through Windows Admin Center (WAC).

entry.title: Building solutions for high availability using Availability Zones
entry.summary: The Azure Availability Zones construct was developed to provide a software and networking solution to protect against datacenter failures and to provide increased high availability (HA) to our customers.

entry.title: Extend your on-premises big data investments with HDInsight
entry.summary: Extend your on-premises big data investments to the cloud. Transform your business by using the advanced analytics capabilities of Azure HDInsight.

entry.title: Customer Churn Prediction
entry.summary: This architecture uses Cortana Intelligence Suite components to predict churn probability and helps find patterns in existing data associated with the predicted churn rate.

entry.title: Create personalized marketing solutions
entry.summary: Create personalized marketing offers and improve customer response using big-data insights based on Azure Machine Learning and Stream Analytics.

entry.title: Improper Instantiation antipattern
entry.summary: Avoid continually creating new instances of an object that is meant to be created once and then shared.

entry.title: Web API design best practices
entry.summary: Learn the best practices for designing web APIs that support platform independence and service evolution.

entry.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
entry.summary: Azure Well-Architected Framework describes five pillars of cost optimization, operational excellence, performance efficiency, reliability, and security, that result in a high quality and scalable cloud architecture.

entry.summary: Learn the best practices for multitenant applications, in terms of authentication, authorization, and identity management.

entry.title: Extraneous Fetching antipattern
entry.summary: Retrieving more data than needed for a business operation can result in unnecessary I/O overhead, cause unnecessary I/O overhead, and reduce responsiveness in entity frameworks.

entry.title: Performance testing and antipatterns
entry.summary: Build scalability solutions for common stressors by learning about performance antipatterns. These are common practices that are likely to cause scalability problems when an application is under pressure.

entry.title: No Caching antipattern
entry.summary: Repeatedly fetching the same data, in a cloud application that handles many concurrent requests, can reduce performance and scalability. Reduce latency by detecting and mitigating this no caching antipattern in your application.

entry.title: Tradeoffs for performance efficiency
entry.summary: Discover the pros and cons of performance optimization. Learn about tradeoffs between performance efficiency, operational excellence, reliability, scalability, and more.

entry.summary: Community jury is a stakeholder collaboration technique that allows project teams to understand the perceptions and concerns of stakeholders, and take actions based on this understanding.
